title: MicrosoftFabricConnection
description: Microsoft Fabric Database Connection Config (Warehouse & Lakehouse SQL Endpoints)

tenantId.title: Tenant ID
tenantId.description: Microsoft Entra (Azure AD) Tenant ID for authentication.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Application (client) ID of the Service Principal for authentication.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Client secret for Service Principal authentication.

authorityUri.title: Authority URI
authorityUri.description: Microsoft Entra authority URI for authentication.

workspaceId.title: Workspace ID
workspaceId.description: Microsoft Fabric Workspace ID (GUID). Required for identifying the Fabric workspace.

database.title: Database
database.description: Warehouse or Lakehouse name to connect to. This is optional parameter, if you would like to restrict the metadata reading to a single database. When left blank, OpenMetadata Ingestion attempts to scan all the databases.

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: ODBC driver version for the connection.

ingestAllDatabases.title: Ingest All Databases
ingestAllDatabases.description: Ingest data from all Warehouses and Lakehouses in the workspace. You can use databaseFilterPattern on top of this.

schemaFilterPattern.title: Default Schema Filter Pattern
schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude schemas that matches the pattern.

tableFilterPattern.title: Default Table Filter Pattern
tableFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude tables that matches the pattern.

databaseFilterPattern.title: Default Database Filter Pattern
databaseFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude databases that matches the pattern.
